entry: Greetings, adventurer. Welcome to this ancient and mysterious land.
I am your designated magical gender fairy and will guide you on your quest. I bet you have a lot of questions
>What gender related magic can you cast? @magic
visited: >What gender related magic can you cast? @magic
friendly: Ho ho ho, what a friendly fella you are. The last one wasn't of the talkative kind.
But you and I will get along just fine.
chosenone: It wasn't a pretty sight. Lot's of misunderstandings, some disrespectful verbal exchanges.
Long story short, you won't see him anytime soon. Trust me.
Subtelty is not my strong suit
>I can see that. Back to topic!
whatsgoingon: Oh you now, the usual. Some unresolved cataclysmic quarrels between some fire elementals.
You'll find one of them just around the corner to the east
dangerous: Not as dangerous as it sounds. How dangerous can a sentient fire be...
likefire: Please don't touch the fire, man... We cannot deal with another lawsuit. Not to speak of the smell...
Took a while to get the stench of the plains
What a great comedian you are!
spider: What, don't you see the fairy wings on my back?
I worked really hard to earn these.
magic: I'm not your run of the mill gender fairy.
With my bachelor degree in gender studies, I know everything about genders
I can tell that you have one of two genders!
Ho ho ho, that's not all! I have the power to accidentally change the gender of humans against their will
Abra cadabra and it is done!
You are very welcome, gender swapped human!
